item.title: Droprate, Pi
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

Npcdrops.tsm:

//Monster name
[COLOR=Red]1615[/COLOR]:[COLOR=Orange]30[/COLOR] [COLOR=Green]995[/COLOR]:[COLOR=Blue]1000[/COLOR]

Color codes:

[COLOR=Red]Red[/COLOR]: NPC ID;
[COLOR=Orange]Orange[/COLOR]: Drop Rarity;
[COLOR=Green]Green[/COLOR]: Item ID;
[COLOR=Blue]Blue[/COLOR]: Item Amount;

[COLOR=Red]Red[/COLOR]: 1615; //Npc ID
[COLOR=Orange]Orange[/COLOR]: 30; //Inbetween 0-30 You will get a rare drop
[COLOR=Green]Green[/COLOR]: 995; //Coins
[COLOR=Blue]Blue[/COLOR]: 1000; //Amount of coins will be dropped
